moves.1. e4 c5 2. Nf3 d6 3. d4 cxd4 4. Nxd4 Nf: i hate the Sicilian so whenever i reach this point i see an opportunity to go straight into the middle game by exchanging the knights!!
moves.6. Nxc6 bxc6 7. Bc4: with this move  i have completely turned the game from a potentially complected Sicilian opening to  a straight forward open middle game with lots of tension in the center which are my specialty!!
moves.7... e6 8. e5: busts up the center! and black is not prepared!!
i remove blacks only active piece therefore i gain control of the center and do whatever i please at the cost of a pawn!!
moves.11... Bxf6: i think this was a mistake by black pawn takes looks better!!
moves.16. Rd7+ Ke8 17. Rxb7 Rxb7 18. Nxb7 Bxb2: black is afraid of trading the bishop his only piece that was actually active in this game but i don't think he has a choice, either way i win quite comfortably!
moves.24. Rxa7 Rd8: finally black get a another piece to work with so he thinks but i stopped that thought in its track on my next move!!
moves.25... c5 26. Ne4+ Kf5 27. Rxf7+: black finally agreed with me and resigned!!
